DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to follow tumoral proteins metabolism by in vivo no radioactive isotopic tagging (carbon 13 and nitrogen 15).
DOC.brief_title: Study of Tumor Metabolism by Isotopic Tagging in Patients With High-grade Glioma (CARBONOMIC)
DOC.detailed_description: The project aims to study protein turnover in glioblastoma using mass spectrometry after 13C-valine incorporation. This will allow to identify proteins in circulation secreted by tumor which could be diagnostic and pronostic biomarkers in patients With High-grade Glioma.
